00074 template <class numberType>
00075 numberType findMax(list<numberType> &numbers){
00076         numberType a,b;
00077         if ( numbers.size() == 0 ){
00078                 return a;
00079         }else{
00080                 a = numbers.head();
00081         }
00082         
00083         forall(b,numbers){
00084                 if (b>a){
00085                         a=b;
00086                 }
00087         }
00088         return a;
00089 }
00090 
00091 template <class numberType>
00092 numberType findMin(list<numberType> &numbers){
00093         numberType a,b;
00094         if ( numbers.size() == 0 ){
00095                 return a;
00096         }else{
00097                 a = numbers.head();
00098         }
00099         
00100         forall(b,numbers){
00101                 if (b<a){
00102                         a=b;
00103                 }
00104         }
00105         return a;
00106 }
